1.0.0.name: wordpress/wp-strapblogger-lite
1.0.0.description: WP StrapBlogger Lite is about blogging with style. A clean and light WordPress theme built on Twitter Bootstrap with a two column layout format. Sporting the Bootstrap Carousel on the home page to compliment your content (posts) plus a home page intro widget area. The theme supports individual widget areas for blog (post lists), posts (single post) and pages plus four widgets in the footer area – the theme customizer presents the end user with options to hide the navbar on the home page, set slider to fade or slide plus the option to turn on/off the carousel, hide the footer credit links plus add your own custom copyright details. As a design default, posts are rendered with either the featured image, first image in post or a placeholder image if no images are attached to the post. See website for more details and documentation.
